p: In another study ul Qamar et al. (2020) screened the Chinese medicinal plants library of 32,297 phytocompounds for potential binding with 3CL pro of SARS-CoV-2 generated by homology modeling. The isoflavone namely 5,7,3′,4′-tetrahydroxy-2′-(3,3-dimethylallyl) isoflavone extracted from Psorothamnus arborescens showed the highest binding affinity with 3CL pro of SARS-CoV-2 ( Table 1; ul Qamar et al., 2020).
